text: Gábor Görgey (born Artúr Görgey; 22 November 1929 – 11 April 2022) was a Hungarian writer, poet, director and politician. He was Minister of Culture between 2002 and 2003. Görgey died on 11 April 2022 in Solymár, Hungary at the age of 92.Meghalt Görgey Gábor ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Hungarian poets Category:Hungarian novelists Category:Theatre directors Category:Politicians from Budapest
title: Gábor Görgey
